entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 10:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:49 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 30 late in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:49 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:49 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
